numbered_ace_sentences: 1. A higher income of a parent increases the likelihood that a student will be accepted.
2. I wonder which test score they compare.
3. I wonder how this test score compares to the average test score.
6. Some people in my community apply to colleges now.
7. Some people in my community decide now which colleges are worth applying to.
8. Such statistics make some students not want to apply to some colleges.
10. Some students compare themselves to richer peers.
11. The money of a father can help a student get into college.
